version_description:
● Added a new "Benchmark Mode," that Automates the Process of Testing your camera's Full-Res Capture Performance @ 30 fps +-5% (i.e., cycle-to-cycle timing range of 31.67 ms -to- 35.0 ms) ... works with ALL 12 Mpx & 8 Mpx Back cameras, as well as the 7 Mpx Front camera, on your iPhone AND/OR iPad ... see Settings for Photosets.

● v5.20 represents a First Step towards making Photosets "the de-facto standard" for testing Mobile Camera "Burst Photo Capture Performance" !

● Remember the name "Photosets Burst Photo Benchmark" ... it is a mobile industry first, a Real-World (Camera) Application Benchmark, & it is happening now (v5.20+) !

● Added a new "Benchmark Mode," that Automates the Process of Testing your camera's Full-Res Capture Performance @ 30 fps +-5% (i.e., cycle-to-cycle timing range of 31.67 ms -to- 35.0 ms) ... works with ALL 12 Mpx & 8 Mpx Back cameras, as well as the 7 Mpx Front camera, on your iPhone AND/OR iPad ... see Settings for Photosets.

● v5.20 represents a First Step towards making Photosets "the de-facto standard" for testing Mobile Camera "Burst Photo Capture Performance" !

● Remember the name "Photosets Burst Photo Benchmark" ... it is a mobile industry first, a Real-World (Camera) Application Benchmark, & it is happening now (v5.20+) !

● Added a new "Benchmark Mode," that Automates the Process of Testing your camera's Full-Res Capture Performance @ 30 fps +-5% (i.e., cycle-to-cycle timing range of 31.67 ms -to- 35.0 ms) ... works with ALL 12 Mpx & 8 Mpx Back cameras, as well as the 7 Mpx Front camera, on your iPhone AND/OR iPad ... see Settings for Photosets.

● v5.20 represents a First Step towards making Photosets "the de-facto standard" for testing Mobile Camera "Burst Photo Capture Performance" !

● Remember the name "Photosets Burst Photo Benchmark" ... it is a mobile industry first, a Real-World (Camera) Application Benchmark, & it is happening now (v5.20+) !

● Added a new "Benchmark Mode," that Automates the Process of Testing your camera's Full-Res Capture Performance @ 30 fps +-5% (i.e., cycle-to-cycle timing range of 31.67 ms -to- 35.0 ms) ... works with ALL 12 Mpx & 8 Mpx Back cameras, as well as the 7 Mpx Front camera, on your iPhone AND/OR iPad ... see Settings for Photosets.

● v5.20 represents a First Step towards making Photosets "the de-facto standard" for testing Mobile Camera "Burst Photo Capture Performance" !

● Remember the name "Photosets Burst Photo Benchmark" ... it is a mobile industry first, a Real-World (Camera) Application Benchmark, & it is happening now (v5.20+) !

● Drops the app's ONE & ONLY In-App Purchase (IAP), "Extreme Performance," & Kicks Off a "pivot" to an entirely new Business Model & Strategy, an innovative Burst Photo Camera App "sub" service, which Users can use to "activate" the most-advanced & highest-performance features & capabilities of the app.

● Drops the app's ONE & ONLY In-App Purchase (IAP), "Extreme Performance," & Kicks Off a "pivot" to an entirely new Business Model & Strategy, an innovative Burst Photo Camera App "sub" service, which Users can use to "activate" the most-advanced & highest-performance features & capabilities of the app.

● Drops the app's ONE & ONLY In-App Purchase (IAP), "Extreme Performance," & Kicks Off a "pivot" to an entirely new Business Model & Strategy, an innovative Burst Photo Camera App "sub" service, which Users can use to "activate" the most-advanced & highest-performance features & capabilities of the app.

● Drops the app's ONE & ONLY In-App Purchase (IAP), "Extreme Performance," & Kicks Off a "pivot" to an entirely new Business Model & Strategy, an innovative Burst Photo Camera App "sub" service, which Users can use to "activate" the most-advanced & highest-performance features & capabilities of the app.

● Adds a User requested Enhancement, a "Camera Prep" Progress Indicator !

● Additional 5% or so Performance Boost !

● Additional Secret Sauce Code that increases the Capture (Timing) Performance of Full-Res 12 Mpx Burst Photo Sets !
● Additional Secret Sauce Code that increases the Capture (Timing) Performance of Full-Res 12 Mpx Burst Photo Sets !
● Additional Secret Sauce Code that increases the Capture (Timing) Performance of Full-Res 12 Mpx Burst Photo Sets !
● Additional Secret Sauce Code that increases the Capture (Timing) Performance of Full-Res 12 Mpx Burst Photo Sets !

● This is an Extremely Important Update ! ... it adds a new "native" Burst mode-like capture mode option that piggybacks on ALL of the existing secret sauce code !

● We've added a new Camera option (switch) that enables you to toggle between Photosets' legacy "Pro Capture" mode, & the brand-new "native" Burst mode-like capture mode !

● Specifically, when the Pro Capture switch is set to OFF, Photosets' shutter button responds to Long-Press actions ... simply long-press the camera shutter button to trigger (continuous) capture ... when you release the long-press, capture stops ... just like with the Pro Capture mode, up-to "30" Full-Res 12 Mpx photos, OR up-to "45" 4K, 8 Mpx, OR 7 Mpx (front) photos, can be captured with this new capture mode ... & of course, with Photosets it's 30 fps (capture) for both modes ! ... the key difference, is that when Pro Capture is switched to OFF, Photosets stores ONLY the "n" photos prior to releasing the long-press ! ... where "n" is up-to 30 (Full-Res 12 Mpx) photos OR up-to 45 (4K, 8 Mpx, OR 7 Mpx front) photos ... please remember this key difference ... you'll very-likely need to experiment alittle to master it, as well as how-best to Limit / Control the number of photos captured per set.

● This new "native" Burst mode-like capture mode piggybacks on top of a lot of existing secret sauce code (used for Pro Capture) ... as such, it offers you far superior performance than any "traditional" long-press implementation ! ... for example, you can capture Full-Res 12 Mpx "HEIC" photos @ 30 fps !!! ... in other words, hardware-based HEVC-encoded Full-Res 12 Mpx photos @ 30 fps !!!

● RE-defined & cleaned-up the Camera Settings Dialog (now Easier to Use) ... this is the Dialog that is presented just-before you transition into the Camera (typically via a Swipe to the Left when in the Home View).
● Added a placeholder for the External Microphone switch.

● Adds "Captured Audio" support for Burst Videos crafted from "UN-comp. RGB" Burst Photos !
---
● As a reminder, Photosets supports two Image Compressed formats, JPEG & HEIC (i.e., HEVC encoded), & one format that does NOT include ANY Image Compression, which we refer to as "UN-comp. RGB".
● Specifically, UN-comp. RGB is simply 8 bits of Red, Green, & Blue, per-pixel, in the Display P3 color space.
● UN-comp. RGB represents the Highest Quality Possible in High-Perf Mobile Burst Photography !

● Adds "Captured Audio" support for Burst Videos crafted from "UN-comp. RGB" Burst Photos !

● Important User Interface & Audio Capture Refinements !

● Important User Interface & Audio Capture Refinements !

● The Default Capture Resolution is now set to 4K on ALL iPhones & iPads with 2.5 GB OR more of DRAM, & includes Cinematic Image Stabilization on ALL iPhones & iPads that support it.
● As a reminder, on ALL High-End iPhones, Photosets supports three Capture Resolutions, 8 Mpx, 4K, & Full-Res 12 Mpx, as well as two Color Spaces, sRGB & Display P3.
● You control the Capture Resolution & the Color Space (on a per photo set basis) via the Capture Resolution + Color Space slider on the Home View.
● Prior to this update, the Default Capture Resolution was set to Full-Res 12 Mpx on ALL High-End iPhones, & set to 8 Mpx on ALL other iPhones, as well as with ALL iPads.
---
● 8 Mpx & Full-Res 12 Mpx are recommended for use with a Tripod OR Monopod, OR when your primary goal is ONLY capturing Burst Photos (vs. capturing Burst Photos + crafting a Video, OR Videos, from those Burst Photos).
● 4K (because of its Cinematic Image Stabilization benefit) is recommended for Handheld operation.
---
● Note ALSO that there are Important Video Maker A/V Sync Refinements in this Update as well.
---
● Please note that because of the Technical Challenge, Photosets supports Audio Capture & A/V Sync ONLY on the 2019 iPhones; i.e., the 11, 11 Pro, & 11 Pro Max.

● Important Refinements & Bug Fixes !
---
● Also, added a first-cut of new capture mode, we call "Custom B2B," where B2B = Back to Back (Capture Runs).
● Custom B2B (accessible via the In-App Settings Dialog) is enabled ONLY on 2019 iPhones with the "Pro" In-App Purchase.
● Custom B2B leverages the Back Wide Image Sensor of the 2019 iPhones in a novel way, & for a novel purpose (to assist Doctors with their "Skin & Eyes Infection Analysis").

● Important Refinements & Bug Fixes !

● Important Refinements !
● Important Refinements !
● Important Refinements !
● Important Refinements !

● Kicks Off a Strategy Change !
● On iPhones & iPads with 3.5 GB or more of DRAM, the base version of the app now enables you to capture up-to "30" (burst) photos per set (@ 30 fps) !
● That's 100% more Full-Res 12 Mpx, 4K, & 8 Mpx (burst) photos than before !
● The "Pro" IAP is still needed to capture up-to "45" (burst) photos per set !
---
● We made the change primarily because "30" (burst) photos per set is a better fit for the app's 30-scene Burst Video Maker !
● Specifically, burst photo sets with 30-45 photos per set make better Videos !
● Photo sets with "30" photos produce 1.0 second video scenes (x 30 = 30 second Videos).
● Photo sets with "45" photos produce 1.5 second video scenes (x 30 = 45 second Videos).
---
● OK, so what does that really mean ?
● You can make "multi-scene" Short Form Videos !
● For example, a 15-second Video consisting of "10" 1.5-second scenes !
● Only possible from a Next-Gen Burst Photo Camera App like Photosets !
---
● Note that we ALSO made the change because Photosets is an "UN-Discovered Gem of an App," & we would like more people to use it !
● More for FREE always helps the cause !
---
● Also added-back the "Benchmark Mode" feature, & with a new, important twist !
● Specifically, it's now a CPU-only Test intended to help you figure-out if the A-series processor in your iPhone is "Good to Go" for High-Performance Burst Photo Capture.
● Benchmark Mode is supported on iPhones & iPads with 3.5 GB or more of DRAM.
---
● As always, please see the Tables on the "Photosets" webpage on our website !
● They will help you Quickly Figure-Out what Photosets is ALL-about !

● They will help you Quickly Figure-Out what Photosets is ALL-about !

● Adds a first-cut of RAW Burst™ support !
● More specifically, "RAW DNG" (Burst Photo Set) Camera Capture support !
---
● Also adds a first-cut of RAW DNG (Burst Photo Set) Manager / Editor support !
---
● As a reminder, the three new/relatively-new AVCapturePhotoOutput Camera Capture Pipeline features, Portrait Burst (Port), Multi-Exposure Burst (3xE), & RAW Burst (RAW DNG), are each 2019 iPhone-specific feature additions, & each requires the "Pro" In-App Purchase.
---
● Also as a reminder, please see the Tables on our website, as they will help you quickly figure-out what Photosets is ALL-about, as well as what you get on your particular iPhone AND/OR iPad !

● Another Important NON-trivial code update !
● Specifically, adds a number of Important "Under-the-Hood" Enhancements & Refinements !
● Capture up-to "45" Photos / Set of Full-Res 12 Mpx, 4K, OR 8 Mpx, @ 30 fps, & with Perfect OR near-Perfect Cycle-to-Cycle Timing !

● Important "RAW DNG Burst Photo Capture" Refinements & Bug Fixes !
● Post capture, you can View your RAW DNG Burst Photo Sets via the Main Menu's "Mange RAW DNG" option, & View "the companion" HEIC Burst Photo Set in the same manner as any other captured JPEG OR HEIC burst photo set (i.e., via the Editor).
● As a reminder, Photosets supports RAW DNG Burst Photo Capture ONLY on the Back Wide Camera on the iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, 12, & 12 Pro.
● You do NOT need the Pro IAP for this feature !

● Another BIGGIE, & Time for us to Make a BIG Splash !
● We've Dropped (what had been) the app's ONE & ONLY In App Purchase, Burst Photo Pro, & folded its Performance, Capabilities & Features into the Base version of the app !
---
● As a reminder, Photosets uses an Apple Camera Framework for capturing Photos that does NOT generate a Shutter sound during Photo capture.
● The ONLY exception to this is the app's RAW DNG capture, which uses a different Apple Camera Framework (which does generate a Shutter sound during Photo capture).
